article_title: Exclusive: Postponed Tokyo 2020 Games could open door for drug cheats - USADA
article_description: The one year postponement of the 2020 Tokyo Olympics could open the door for convicted drug cheats to compete for medals  and is something that will need to addressed  United States Anti Doping Agency  USADA  chief Travis Tygart told Reuters on Tuesday
